title: satos-higames

created_time: April 05, 2023, 02:09:46 PMLast edit: November 03, 2023, 03:47:44 AM by satos-higames
content: We announce: We are looking for Moderators!Â¿Would you like to be part of the Staff of our platform?We will offer unique benefits and privileges on the platform. Join Now!Contact: support@satoshigames.ioEverything will be subject to evaluation, we will consider ranks in the bitcointalk.org forum for example.SatoshiGames.io

comments.author: Kavelj22
comments.body: Hello SatoI have checked your project and I am interested to your offer.Feel free to contact me via forum pm or telegram: @kavelj22Cheers,Kavelj22

comments.author: pakhitheboss
comments.body: Hi Sato!I am aware about the project and interested in being part of it. Please reach me @pakhitheboss on telegram.Thanks.

comments.author: bhadz
comments.body: Hello satos-higames!I have experience in moderation, I'm interested. Kindly evaluate me if I can be part of your staff team. Thank you.

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Hi!Have you hired a moderator, already?If not then I want to offer myself for your project.For contact, you can send me a message on the forum or send me a message via telegram. My telegram profile is mentioned on my bitcointalk profile.

comments.author: Kavelj22
comments.body: Quote from: shasan on April 15, 2023, 05:47:11 PMHi!Have you hired a moderator, already?If not then I want to offer myself for your project.For contact, you can send me a message on the forum or send me a message via telegram. My telegram profile is mentioned on my bitcointalk profile.I don't think he was serious about his offer or that he succeeded in finding the profiles he was looking for. I sent him a private message on the same date the show was published, basically including the link to the telegram to continue the discussion about the details and he was active in the days following until 04-11 but he gave no sign of life. Perhaps he insists on communicating via the website's email, but there is no justification for this insistence if he is in urgent need of employees.I visited the forum and it does not seem very active and needs more attention. I edited many ideas regarding that forum and ways to develop it. I was going to put it up for discussion with him, but it seems that I was wasting my time.

comments.author: Bananington
comments.body: Quote from: Kavelj22 on April 15, 2023, 06:00:27 PMI don't think he was serious about his offer or that he succeeded in finding the profiles he was looking for. I sent him a private message on the same date the show was published, basically including the link to the telegram to continue the discussion about the details and he was active in the days following until 04-11 but he gave no sign of life. Perhaps he insists on communicating via the website's email, but there is no justification for this insistence if he is in urgent need of employees.It is possible to think that he maybe decided that he was not as ready to take on moderators yet, maybe something happened that we have no idea about that made the emergency no longer to be an emergency, he may respond after a while, maybe they are no longer in a hurry. For the OP, if you no longer need the moderators and you read this, please lock the thread.

comments.author: Kavelj22
comments.body: Quote from: Bananington on April 15, 2023, 06:53:39 PMQuote from: Kavelj22 on April 15, 2023, 06:00:27 PMI don't think he was serious about his offer or that he succeeded in finding the profiles he was looking for. I sent him a private message on the same date the show was published, basically including the link to the telegram to continue the discussion about the details and he was active in the days following until 04-11 but he gave no sign of life. Perhaps he insists on communicating via the website's email, but there is no justification for this insistence if he is in urgent need of employees.It is possible to think that he maybe decided that he was not as ready to take on moderators yet, maybe something happened that we have no idea about that made the emergency no longer to be an emergency, he may respond after a while, maybe they are no longer in a hurry. It is not the first time that he has published an offer to request moderators for the forum that he launched. You can review his posting history and you will notice how many times he has done this in the same way.There are two possible reasons. The first is that he actually found moderators and forgot to close the topic, and this is what I doubt happened. The second reason that is more plausible is that he does not have enough budget for support and is in fact looking for potential partners in the form of looking for smoderators. There is no other reason for it to break off like this. I registered in his forum, but I can't know which member he is exactly so that I can message him there.
